programme.title: Masters of Love
programme.desc: Masters of Love' is a funny and moving look at the complications of modern love, friendship and dating, starring Edinburgh Festival Best Newcomer Ciarán Dowd ('Drunk History'). A group of friends are at different stages in their relationships and none of them are convinced about what they're doing: Emmy and Samantha are due to get married, Josh and Jenifer are breaking up and Niall is sleeping around but can any of them hold down a relationship?

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: From Sundance 2007 Audience Award-Winning Director James Strouse, and starring the inimitable Sam Rockwell and fast rising star Emma Roberts, comes the hilarious story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze, his chauvinistic attitude towards women and his overdeveloped macho nature, in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a Winning Season!

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Life hasn’t been too hot for Josh Framm, a 12-year old boy who just lost his father and has moved to a whole new city. Without any friends and an inclination toward shyness, Josh prefers to practice alone rather than try out for the team. That all changes when Josh meets Buddy, a runaway golden retriever with a wicked talent for shooting hoops. They become fast friends and quickly form a dynamic duo on the school basketball team. Their talent generates a media frenzy that attracts Buddy’s greedy former owner, who wants to cash in on his suddenly lucrative pup.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Wadjemup : Black Prison White Playground

programme.title: Letters to our Children: Stories of Refuge
programme.desc: A group of immigrant and refugee mothers from 10 different countries and speaking different languages create a book of illustrations showcasing heartfelt letters to their children as a way to explain what brought them to Winnipeg, Canada and what they hope their lives will be like. This film follows the women’s incredible journey as they find a way to pass their stories to their children.

programme.title: Galahad
programme.desc: On the 8th June 1982, at the height of the Falklands War, 53 men lost their lives and hundreds were injured in Argentine air attacks on British ships Sir Galahad and Sir Tristram. 32 of those men were Welsh Guards - some of them no more than boys.

programme.title: Data Mining The Deceased
programme.desc: More than half of North Americans are fascinated by genealogy. Some gain a sense of identity by uncovering their ancestors, their culture, and their country of origin. Others find it disorienting when they discover that their history differs from what they have always believed. But there is another side to the rise in genealogy that goes beyond human interest. It is arguably the largest historical enterprise in the world, driven by big religion, big business and big technology.

programme.title: 281 Days
programme.desc: In March 2007, Dutch adventurist Ralph Tuijn attempted to become the first person to row solo across the Pacific Ocean unassisted. Departing from Callao Peru, and leaving his wife and daughter behind for more than nine months, Ralph faced the effects of La Nina, a broken water-maker, and rotten food provisions – leaving him with little or no food or fresh water in the middle of the Pacific Ocean

programme.title: The Age of Robots

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Champions: France
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, seven-time UEFA champion and FIFA Women's Player of the Year in 2018, awaits the arrival of Annie Fortems, a pioneer of French women's football, and Sonia Ouchene, a promising young player from Stade de Reims, at the Olympique Lyonnais stadium. Wendie recalls the start of her career, her victories and difficult moments including racist attacks. Annie reveals how her generation brought women's football into the French mainstream, despite receiving death threats, while Sonia speaks freely about the gender pay gap between women's and men's football. The meeting of the three is resplendent with mutual admiration.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Champions: Italy
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, in Rome, reveals herself as a woman of character, unafraid to be the first woman in any feat, such as the first to score four goals at Wembley Stadium. We meet Barbara Bonansea, Juventus player elected FIFA FIFPro Women's World 11 2020, with her family including her grandmother, who supported her in her desire to be a footballer. US Sassuolo youngster Benedetta Orsi talks optimistically about how she overcame the illness that forced her to give up tennis but gave her the opportunity to develop her passion for football.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Champions: Sweden
programme.desc: Three-time Olympic medallist and 2012 FIFA World Women's Coach of the Year Pia Sundhage recalls her reaction at being called up to join the Swedish women's national team. Speaking to Stina Blackstenius, FIFA Women's World Cup Bronze Medal and two Olympic Games Silver Medal winner, and Molly Johansson, both players for BK Häcken, Pia explains her belief that football gave her a way of life. She relates the feelings she had when she took part in the Olympic Games, and how playing in France made her stronger, while Molly shares her goals for the future.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: The Meaning of Van Life
programme.desc: The Meaning of Vanlife is an adventurous, revealing look into the Vanlife community through the eyes of nomads who have chosen to live a life of freedom on the road.

programme.title: Cocos Islands, Clams, Mission Beach, Antartic Wildlife

programme.title: Sonic Magic : The Wonder and Science of Sound
programme.desc: Sound has the power to charm, annoy, and even change history. Sonic Magic: The Wonder and Science of Sound reveals the historic force, promise, and potential of sound – and a strange phenomenon called cymatics that has created a new scientific mystery. Sonic Magic explores how sound has shaped our history, introducing us to fields of acoustic ecology and also research labs where sound is eliminating cancer tumours and much more.

programme.title: Luke Nguyens Food Trail - Saigon, Vietnam Part 1
programme.desc: With Luke’s busy life it’s important to find the work-life balance. Devoting Sunday as a family day, he explores the outdoors and the variety of restaurants Saigon has to offer. He cooks up several dishes and entertains his friend with a dinner party favourite of banh xeo.

programme.title: Luke Nguyens Food Trail - Hong Kong Part1
programme.desc: Inspired by his Hakka Heritage tracing back to Hong Kong, Luke wanted to influence Vietnamese cuisine in Hong Kong by combining flavours from all over Vietnam.

programme.title: Nicholas and Alexandra : The Letters
programme.desc: Ever since their brutal murders one hundred years ago, the world has been fascinated by Tsar Nicholas II and his wife, the Empress Alexandra. Through the couple’s politically damning, sexually intimate and personally revealing letters, this two part docu-drama, presented by historian Dr. Suzannah Lipscomb, explores Nicholas and Alexandra’s complex love story and the couple’s role in the lead up to the Russian Revolution of 1917 which led to their eventual brutal and tragic executions.

programme.title: Zenith, Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: The Launchers - The first step in leaving the Earth’s surface must be made via the huge power and precision control of a rocket. It’s expensive to reach space but new technology is bringing the cost down. This episode examines the range of launchers available today.

programme.title: Zenith, Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Mars is our nearest planetary neighbour and its environment resembles own more closely than any other member of our planetary family. Robotic probes have revealed that water once flowed on the surface. This episode follows the quest to find traces of life on Mars.

programme.desc: The Kids Guide to the Kalahari is a fun, irreverent, yet educational series of 5 minute programmes that bring to life the magic of the Kalahari desert. Narrated by the central character Kusi, the wise old camel thorn tree, each episode looks at a different aspect of Kalahari life and introduces the animal characters. From the cute little ground squirrels to the dignified leopard, Kusi's companions are brought to life by fun, quirky animations that add pace and interest to the stories. A must see for children of reading age and above.

programme.title: Off The Grid Loango National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Step into the wilds of Loango where you’ll see unique lowland gorillas, elephants and wild buffaloes blissfully strolling in their natural habitats. Emeline takes an off the grid tour to the panoramic Gabon where she learns a lot about animal behaviour and their communication signs. Venturing onto the picturesque forested wraps and camping under the open sky will truly give you goosebumps.

programme.title: Landmarks Ha Long Bay, Vietnam
programme.desc: Made up of about 1600 islands and islets huddled together in a lush corner of the Tonkin Bay, off Vietnam’s north-east coast, Ha Long Bay is not only a UNESCO World Heritage site, but also central to the mythical and political idea of Vietnam.

programme.title: Best From The Rest Maltese Experiences
programme.desc: Malta is not just about sun drenched islands, but a showcase of some of the finest sights that the Mediterranean has to offer. We give you five reasons to visit the European paradise.

programme.title: Unwind Nikara Yala, Sri Lanka

programme.title: Backpack Ukhrul, India

programme.title: Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan

As they set out to explore the surroundings, they chance upon a beautiful waterfall.

programme.title: The Cook’s Pantry with Matt Sinclair Season 1
programme.desc: From an early age, Matt knew he wanted to create something unique with his food. From the suburbs of Sydney, Matty spent over a decade working in hospitality. Here he evolved a curiosity of the industry, and the desire to work with food as a career. This saw him audition for MasterChef, where he quickly became a household favourite, triumphing as the 2016 runner up. Shortly after, Matt’s dream to own a successful food truck business came true. The quick growth and success saw their business grow into a fullyfledged restaurant in Noosa on the Sunshine Coast. The Cooks Pantry is a weekly cooking show that celebrates the creation of wholesome Australian food. Join Matt Sinclair and his fellow foodies Courtney Roulston and Michael Weldon. As successful MasterChef contestants, the team combine together to help you create simple, delicious food.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: The tables turn when a seasoned hostage negotiator takes hostages and risks all to prove his own innocence.

programme.desc: The pioneer trek across the plains of the Mormon pioneers.

programme.title: Saints And Soldiers 3
programme.desc: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

programme.title: Blind
programme.desc: Bestselling novelist, Bill Oakland loses his wife and his sight in a vicious car crash. Five years later Socialite Suzanne Dutchman is forced to read to Bill in an intimate room three times a week as a plea bargain...

programme.title: Make or Break
programme.desc: Fun-loving Hank and Alex try to save their 14-year relationship by playing a game with only one rule: no matter what they ask each other to do, they can’t say no!

programme.title: Cinderella Pact
programme.desc: Nola, Deb, and Nancy are best friends who create a Cinderella Pact—a weight loss agreement using advice from "fairy godmother" newspaper columnist Bel.

programme.title: Dare to Dream
programme.desc: Summer 1961: Emil is working as an extra on a film set in East Germany when he falls head over heels in love with French dancer Milou. But the building of the Berlin Wall soon tears the lovebirds apart.

programme.title: Before You Say I Do
programme.desc: George wants to marry Jane, but she swore off marriage after her first husband broke her heart. After wishing he had met Jane before she got married, George winds up ten years in the past.

programme.title: Modern Persuasion
programme.desc: A sexy, modern telling of Jane Austen's "Persuasion." Wren (Alicia Witt: Orange is the New Black) is a happy, single and self-confessed workaholic who, after rising to the top of the corporate ladder, finds herself coming home to her cat every night.

programme.title: Hell's House
programme.desc: Jimmy idolizes bootlegger Matt, and when he refuses to implicate his friend, he is sent to reform school. He befriends Shorty, a boy with a heart condition, and escapes to let the world know about the brutal conditions.

programme.title: Stuck
programme.desc: A light and humorous exploration of one couple's marital problems.

programme.title: The General
programme.desc: Rejected by the Confederate army and taken for a coward by his beloved Annabelle Lee (Marion Mack), young Johnny Gray (Keaton) is given a chance to redeem himself when Yankee spies steal his cherished locomotive. Johnny wages a one-man war against hijacke

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: An 80-year-old actress returns to the small Chilean town of her youth to fulfill her father's dream of creating a TV channel in a place which has never known television.

programme.title: Die Welt
programme.desc: Die Welt is an audacious hybrid between fiction and documentary, showing contemporary Tunisia shortly after the Jasmine revolution in 2011.

programme.title: Inale
programme.desc: Inale is the beautiful daughter of the great King Oche, of the Idoma people in Idomaland, Nigeria. Her beloved Odeh must win the wrestling tournament to win her hand in marriage. A stranger appears, that challenges not only the tradition of the village but the strength of Odeh and Inale's true love.

programme.title: The Bill Collector
programme.desc: Lorenzo Adams works at a bill collection agency in Norfolk. When an old debt of his own suddenly comes, Lorenzo has less than three weeks to payback $150,000.

When Kevin finds out that he and his family are about to be evicted from their home, he and his friends attempt to raise the money to save them from this fate, but their initial idea does not go as planned.

programme.desc: A range of stand-out short films in the German language showcasing original stories, deeply layered characters, and high-quality production values. Some highly relevant themes are explored in this selection.

programme.title: Paddle to the Sea
programme.desc: This film recounts the adventures of a toy Native American canoe as it makes its way from the Great Lakes to the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Small Time Crooks
programme.desc: Dishwasher and small-fry criminal Ray hits on a plan with his partners in crime to re-open a local pizza place and dig through to the bank down the street. As his wife can't cook pizza but does great cookies, that's what they sell. While the no-hope tunnellers get lost underground, the cookie operation really takes off and the team find themselves rich business people. But the other local money isn't quite ready to accept them.

programme.title: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Ancient mysteries. Powerful evil. And a fearless hero's quest through a fantastical realm of steam-powered wonders and sinister magic... In THE ADVENTURER: THE CURSE OF THE MIDAS BOX, seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundi's life is turned upside down when his parents vanish and his younger brother is kidnapped. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth - but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!

programme.title: Looking for Grace
programme.desc: After a teenage girl named Grace goes missing, her parents along with the help of an investigator seek to find her, while also juggling their own secrets and stories between them.

programme.title: Hail Mary!
programme.desc: What do you do when your pro football franchise have lost thirty two games in a row? Buy up a school of Japanese Sumo Wrestlers, with all of its gargantuan 600 plus pound Sumos and make them into linemen protecting your precious star quarterback, O'Rourke.

programme.title: City of Gold
programme.desc: The writer Pierre Berton narrates the story of his childhood hometown's history during the Klondike Gold Rush. In doing so, Berton surveys the general history of the last great gold rush and what those people struggled for in that time really achieved.

programme.title: Copenhagen Road
programme.desc: Late one night Craig, a mechanic, reluctantly agrees to help Nicole, a desperate young woman with a flat tire, in a car all too familiar to him. Nicole's mysterious incident on the old Copenhagen Road slowly strikes an eerie note for Craig and brings his own shady past rushing forward.

programme.title: Greece! - Greece! From the Mountains to the Shoreline, 4. Thessaloniki & Chalkidikí
programme.desc: From lush green forests to snow-capped mountains, from towering cliffs to bare sandbars, the Greek islands are a land of unmatched natural beauty. The islands also have seen Europe’s earliest civilizations, its philosophical founders and its greatest battles. State-of-the-art aerial filming technology takes the audience to hidden coves, volcano craters, and whitewashed monasteries. On the ground olive-farmers, monks, shepherds, ferrymen and sculptors - ordinary people living in exceptional places - give original insights into historical buildings, sacred places and, last not least, culinary traditions that have affected Europe for centuries.

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Life after college is not going as planned for two friends who find themselves lost in a sea of strange jobs.

programme.title: Lovelace
programme.desc: Linda Lovelace is used by the porn industry at the behest of her husband before taking control of her life.

programme.title: Butter
programme.desc: In small-town Iowa, an adopted girl discovers her talent for butter carving and finds herself pitted against an ambitious local woman (Jennifer Garner) in their town's annual contest.

programme.title: Soul Survivors
programme.desc: A freshman has a horrible car accident and finds herself trapped in a twilight world between life and death.

programme.title: Paperhouse
programme.desc: Charlotte's drawings come to life, but her dreamland becomes dangerous after inviting a terrifying monster in.

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home, Jessabelle comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit.

programme.title: An Hour Behind
programme.desc: The time change and a case of mistaken identity result in a wonderful blind date for Trish and Parker, but is it enough to keep them together?

programme.title: Once Upon a Date
programme.desc: When top-notched real estate broker, Josh Donahue, is sent to buyout a community playhouse he unexpectedly falls for the owner forcing him to decide between the family business and true love.

programme.title: Offline
programme.desc: An online stalker torments a young woman.

Through the stories and memories of her mother's rock climbing friends, a group of women known as the 'Rock Chicks', Alex becomes acquainted with the woman she never knew in life, and begins to find her own links to her mother along the way.

programme.title: Sisters of the Groom
programme.desc: Jason ropes his neighbor Sarah into pretending to be his girlfriend for his brother’s wedding but his prying sisters suspect something is amiss.

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Nothing is black or white in this heart-wrenching drama about love, race and forgiveness. Starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle, leaving Eloise not only torn between two families but two worlds.

programme.title: M4FBACKSOON5LOOP
programme.desc: M4FBACKSOON5LOOP

programme.title: An Elephant's Journey
programme.desc: An Elephant’s Journey' is a fun-filled and moving family adventure about a circus elephant and the importance of family and friendship. Starring Disney Channel favourite Jenna Ortega and Hollywood’s David Arquette and Tom Arnold, fans of 'Dumbo' will love this film. Flora is a circus elephant who can no longer perform her tricks. Left out and alone, the circus owner's 14-year old daughter, Dawn, sneaks Flora from the circus after she finds the perfect place for retirement: an elephant sanctuary 480 km away. All that stands between them and the safety of the elephant preserve is hundreds of kilometres of woods, one raging river, two elephant hunters and the fear of not making it. A.k.a. Saving Flora

programme.title: Captain Sharky
programme.desc: Pint-sized swashbuckler Captain Sharky thinks he's the most dangerous pirate on the Seven Seas. To prove his bravery, he sets sail with Mikey, a well-behaved boy whose life Sharky has turned upside down, and Bonnie, a trouble-shooting girl who tends to assume command in every situation. This motley crew sails for big adventures as they thwart the plans of The Admiral and Old Bill the Pirate.

programme.title: A Wizard's Tale
programme.desc: From the writer of Ice Age: The Meltdown and with a stellar voice cast, including Ian McShane (John Wick, Coraline), Lily Collins (Mirror Mirror) and Toby Kebbell (Ben-Hur, Warcraft), A WIZARD’S TALE is an uplifting magical journey that is guaranteed to cast its spell on adults and children alike. A WIZARD’S TALE is a magical family adventure about one boy’s quest to restore happiness to the world after an evil wizard named “The Grump” casts an evil spell on a formerly happy land. Join Terry on his adventure, as he outwits a multitude of weird and wonderful creatures and finds friendship with Princess Dawn along the way. A.k.a. Here Comes the Grump

programme.title: The Titan
programme.desc: As planet Earth’s future hangs in the balance of becoming uninhabitable, the human race faces a cataclysmic ultimatum: adapt or die… Hotshot Air Force pilot, Rick Janssen (Sam Worthington: Avatar) is chosen for a military experiment that will create a human being capable of surviving the harsh environments of Saturn’s moon, TITAN. The experiment is successful, turning Rick into a super-human. But it also creates deadly side-effects which threaten the lives of Rick, his wife (Taylor Schilling: Orange is the New Black) Abigail, his family, and possibly humanity itself. This exhilarating sci-fi thriller from the producers of Insidious and Sense8, also stars Nathalie Emmanuel (Game of Thrones) , Tom Wilkinson (2 time Academy Award® Nominee) and Agyness Deyn (Clash of the Titans, Hard Sun).

programme.title: Letters To God
programme.desc: Tyler Doherty is an extraordinary eight-year-old boy. Surrounded by a loving family and community, and armed with the courage of his faith, he faces his daily battle against cancer with bravery and grace. To Tyler, God is a friend, a teacher and the ultimate pen pal-Tyler’s prayers take the form of letters, which he composes and mails on a daily basis. The letters find their way into the hands of Brady McDaniels, a beleaguered postman standing at a crossroads in his life. At first, he is confused and conflicted over what to do with the letters. But the decision he ultimately makes becomes a testament to the quiet power of one boy’s shining spirit and unshakable faith.

programme.title: Storm Rider
programme.desc: Spoiled 18-year old Dani Fielding's world is turned upside down when her father gets arrested for securities fraud. She has to leave her cushy home and loses her prize horse to stay with her gruff uncle, Sam. As Dani and her uncle struggle to bond, she's given an orphaned colt that is a different type of horse than she is used to training. Dani pours her affection into 'Stormy' and through him learns what's missing in her unsettled life.

programme.title: The Shunning
programme.desc: All her life Katie Lapp has longed for the forbidden things, but will her dreams come at a price too dear to pay? Why would Katie’s mother, a plain and simple Amish-woman who embraces the old ways, hide a beautiful satin baby dress in the attic? The staggering answers come on the eve of Katie’s wedding to widower, Bishop John Beiler, with the arrival of a beautiful “Englisher” woman who has been searching for her, throwing Katie’s life – present and future – into confusion.

programme.title: The Confession
programme.desc: All her life, Katie Lapp (Katie LeClerc) has known no other world than that of the Amish family who raised her. But upon discovering that she was actually adopted from out of the "English" world, her quest for answers to her identity resulted in her being shunned by her people. Now in "The Confession," the thrilling sequel to "The Shunning," Katie is on an even greater quest--to be reunited before it is too late with her long-lost birth mother, Laura Mayfield (Sherry Stringfield), who is dying of cancer. Only the challenges of being Amish in an English world stand in her way... along with one man who has other plans for her biological mother's legacy.

programme.title: Rising Above
programme.desc: After two girls cruelly impersonate her online in a "reverse cyber bullying" plot, Ashley's reputation is ruined and she and her mother flee a growing threat to their lives. Starting over at a new school, romantic interests and the poignant lessons from an eccentric history teacher draw them out of seclusion until they realize confronting a hurtful past is essential to ensure a brighter future.

programme.title: The Morning Show
programme.desc: The weird and unusual world we live in is captured for the early birds to enjoy, expect nothing but jaw-dropping moments during this early morning show.

programme.title: Around the World in a Minute
programme.desc: Around the world in a Minute is a series of short films that takes you through different perspectives in foreign parts of the world.

programme.title: Minute Sports
programme.desc: A celebration of short films based around the topics of Sports, whether that be conventional or unconventional. Competitive or leisurely, all of these films have a subject at the center.

programme.title: There Is No Planet B
programme.desc: Appreciation of what this planet has to offer, through the lens. Films ranging from climate change, sustainability, and land appreciation.

programme.title: Travel Bug
programme.desc: Travel bug will give you that yearning to see the world again in all its wonder through this series of short films. Experience different cultures and people now.

programme.title: Brass Teapot
programme.desc: No pain, no gain. A magical teapot produces free money every time you hurt yourself.

programme.title: Ibiza Undead
programme.desc: When the sun goes down prepare for the Holiday from hell

programme.desc: A journey to the home of magnificent bison herds and the oldest national park in the world

programme.title: World Nature Heritage - Hawaii
programme.desc: Born of fire and water, Manau Kea stretches from the depths of the seas being home to a vast biodiversity

programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, a young girl receives a magical doll on Christmas Eve.

programme.desc: Peabody decides to take part in the “Green Prisons in Bloom” campaign. When Joe learns that climbing ivy can grow 6 m high, he suddenly discovers he has a green thumb. Decides to steal some magical fertilizer from Fabulous Falcon. Before long, the penitentiary is as thick with foliage as a jungle … and the Daltons are playing Tarzan…

programme.title: Monk Little Dog - Season 1 - Episodes 1-7
programme.desc: Monk hammers a nail Monk on a desert island Monk watches TV Monk goes ballooning Monk takes a bath Monk versus Sushi Monk has really got to go! Monk is a jovial little dog who obstinately tries his best but always fails! When thins aren’t working out for Monk, catastrophes follow. Things can get totally out of control real fast!

programme.title: Nuts Nuts Nuts - Season 1 - Episodes 8-14
programme.desc: The sheepfold Oasis Shifting sand The arrival of the penguins The mill Oil The farm Nuts is an obsessed, clumsy blue squirrel. He lives with other animals ina crazy, lively, funny and sometimes absurd world. Wherever he goes, he causes disasters...

programme.title: Glumpers - Season 1 - Episodes 41-50
programme.desc: From episode 41 to 50 The Glumpers are a gang of friends who live together in their home which becomes a kind of nuclear reactor where even a small interaction between its particles can cause a chain reaction with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Mouk - Season 1 - Episodes 37-38
programme.desc: Little Fish Grow Up Runaway Robot Mouk and Chavapa are two globe-trotters: they travel around the world riding their bikes! From Tokyo to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and through Greece, these two friends meet inhabitants from all over the planet… and because nowhere feels quite like home, adventure is always knocking at their door! Climb on a bike with them and discover this realistic, modern and colourful world. Amazing people, unbelievable landscapes, and unknown customs: our two travellers will discover many different countries together. Beyond the differences, they share beautiful experiences and make friends everywhere!

programme.title: JT LeRoy
programme.desc: When her debut novel becomes a best-seller and JT becomes the darling of the literary world, she comes up with a unique solution to preserve her anonymity but give life to her nom-de-plume. Enter her boyfriend’s androgynous sister Savannah Knoop (Kristen Stewart: The Twilight Saga, Charlie’s Angels), who connects with Laura’s punk, feminist, outsider universe and agrees to be JT in the public eye. Together, they embark on a wild ride of double lives, infiltrating the Hollywood and literary elite, and discovering who they are while pretending to be someone else.

programme.title: Love Me Like You Do
programme.desc: Ryan Brenner is a traveling musician, and Jackie Laurel is a fallen country music star who is a recently single mother, battling to hold on to her young daughter. When the free-spirited pair meet by chance, they soon form an unlikely relationship that will teach them to trust and love again, and may change their lives forever.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Breakup
programme.desc: The night Abigail (Christina Ricci) meets Ben (Hamish Linklater) at a bar, they jokingly come up with a list of things to do before their imagined breakup, knowingly full well they’ll never even start a relationship. But when the joke turns in to a one-night stand things become a whole lot more complicated.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: 1879, nine-year-old Maria Sautuola and her father, Marcelino, discover the first cave art and accomplished paintings of galloping bison. But Maria's mother, devout Conchita, is disturbed at the idea that prehistoric savages could have created such magnificent art. The Catholic Church sees this as an attack on Biblical truth. And Carthailac, the leading prehistorian, condemns Marcelino and his discovery as fakes. The family is thrown into crisis and the cave locked up. It takes all their love for each other to find a way through to redemption and recognition.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: RED DOG: THE EARLY YEARS is a glorious tale of youthful adventure set in the Australian outback as a young boy and an Australian Kelpie sheep dog become the best of friends. Set in the late 1980s, 11-year-old Mick is sent to live with his stern farmer grandfather on a vast cattle station. There, he forms an unbreakable bond with a cute puppy he finds covered in blue mud after a storm. Together the pair embark on a series of great adventures amidst the stunning Aussie landscape.

programme.title: Planet Hulk (Marvel)
programme.desc: He was a monster, impossible to control, too dangerous to ignore. So Earth’s mightiest heroes exiled him into outer space. But now THE Incredible Hulk crash-lands on the distant planet Sakaar, ruled by the tyrannical Red King. Sold into slavery, the Hulk becomes the planet’s mightiest gladiator—but his new masters get more than they bargained for when he forges a bond of brotherhood with his fellow fighters. Unlike Earth, the desperate people of Sakaar believe a monster is just what they need. But will the Hulk be the one to save their world...or destroy it?

programme.title: Witchville
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, Erik and Jason seek out his compatriot Malachy and force him to return to his homeland. When they arrive, they find that Malachy's father, the King, is dead and their lands are completely devastated. Both seek revenge against the Evil Red Queen.

programme.title: Iron Fury
programme.desc: In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles. A time of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love and legendary miracles, this is a time for heroes. 'Iron Fury' is a visceral assault on the senses featuring some of the most heart stopping and authentic skirmishes ever seen on film.

programme.title: Jimmy P
programme.desc: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling some angry Russians, the British Mi5, his impossibly leggy wife and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) must traverse the globe armed only with his good looks and special charm in a race to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.
